name: Programming II zork
tagline: This is a repository in which I will be developing my own version of Zork text adventure.
body:
![](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CbunzPYXIAAqUpm.jpg)# Welcome to Zork Adventures! 
This is a website in which I will be uploading the improvements of my own version of Zork, for those who don't know what Zork is, 
it's a text adventure, you can take a look of it [here](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zork), and if you want to play click [here](http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/5zyoqrsugeopel3ffhz_vq/zork). 

## New features.
___
My version of Zork will implement some HP life and damage, I'll try to mix RPG with puzzles, so you will have some boses to face!

## Map of the game. 
![Map](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CbunzPYXIAAqUpm.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
